EmailTemplate.name: 04-13-22 BNK 62/64 Campaign Email 9.Subject Line Test
EmailTemplate.subject: Watch our new cash recycling ATMs in action
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Our new NCR SelfServTM 60 Series cash recyclers have landed — and are making a big impact. Delivering improved customer experiences, a dynamic upper panel for personalized marketing and digital-first technology to enable contactless and digital authentication. Our NCR SelfServTM 60 Series is built to wow your customers and set you up for the future. Watch our video to see how. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
